title: Launcher Won't Start
body: Every time I try to open League up it wont start. It just says "PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working" and then League closes. Can anyone help me out? This is what it looks like [http://imgur.com/a/IBYZi]

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors usually caused by League missing certain administrative privileges so it can operate properly. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure everything is configured properly. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
I tried everything other than uninstalling and reinstalling and it still doesn't work so I'm going to hope that it works when I reinstall. -,=,
